Review.Titre: Accounting Should be Improved
Review.Contenu: I have been getting invoices for trackers I don't own. I would not buy trackers from Geoforce given these issues.

Review.Titre: Commitment to return phone calls by a…
Review.Contenu: Commitment to return phone calls by a certain day with no call back and no resolution.Original set up was incorrect. Specifically asked for GPS tracking in remote areas, but that was not provided. Set up started on GPS system based on our needs, contract signed months ago, no call back on when updated system will be set up. Billing started after contract signed with a substantial increase but no new devices sent. Several months of incorrect billing with emails to request review, commitment made to follow up but no call backs.Very poor communication.

Review.Titre: Take long time to get answer or call…
Review.Contenu: Take long time to get answer or call for what should be basic answer for  a company

Review.Titre: No Response to queries
Review.Contenu: I have sent emails to the billing department requesting information and assitance and have receioved no response

Review.Titre: In all Honesty
Review.Contenu: In all Honesty, getting ahold of someone here to fix or replace the units that you paid for is like listening to Joe Biden trying to complete a sentence. Trying to get a new unit takes way too long to receive after having to pay again to have a new one sent to your address. call the sales rep assigned to you he won't answer the phone until the corp office finally has to contact him. then calling the corp office to change reps all they tell you is I will relay the message. for the amount of money spent on GPS units and the customer service you receive is p*ss poor. I've had service with Geo tab for 4 years and never seen a rep or a salesman come out or check on our service and see how we are doing.

Review.Titre: This system replaced the old system…
Review.Contenu: This system replaced the old system that had the functionality that was customized for us.  We still can not get trip reports and the current reports are not completed.  We have had this system since around September 2020 and it still is not close to what Cartasite was.

Review.Titre: If you could send us the invoice on…
Review.Contenu: If you could send us the invoice on time.It is 9/11 and still no invoice.

Review.Titre: I am not nor will I ever be a customer…
Review.Contenu: I am not nor will I ever be a customer of a company that doesn't verify the emails provided by their customers to make sure they aren't being given in error in an effort to evade marketing or promotional mailing.  Someone provided my address in such a way without my knowledge or consent.  Had some sort of verification system been in place, this would not have happened.  This may be a great company and a great product, but I will not know or entertain the use of any such company that is this cavalier about privacy.added after reply, as the review comment section doesn't have a provision for replying to a reply:How?  how have you removed me?  this review makes no mention of my email, nor has the profile I used to make said review have any bearing or mention of my email.  This just adds to the credibility and privacy question.

Review.Titre: I am not real impressed by Geo
Review.Contenu: I am not real impressed by Geo - Force . Nobody ever checked to see if we received the Eld's. Nobody checked to see if we had any issues installing the ELD's. Nobody followed up to see about driver or admin training. I guess I should of asked about payment. I was surprised that Geoforce didn't ask for automatic withdrawals. I had quite a time finally getting an answer that I could e-transfer the payment. No body has followed up to see if we are liking the product and if we are having any issues. This in my opinion is TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Nobody has sent an email letting me know. the status of Canadian ELD compliance? Very very disappointed. At this point I can not recommend this company and I almost hope that it doesn't get certified so my contract is void.

Review.Titre: I dislike the new system
Review.Contenu: I dislike the new system. it was much better before Geoforce purchased Cartisite.  We will be replacing this system, it is a major step backwards.

Review.Titre: Very bad customer experience order…
Review.Contenu: Very bad customer experience order device one week ago received but got wrong harnesses again ordered harnesses it has been one week haven’t received correct harnesses my truck is parked in yard for 2 week thinking g about cancelling contact but stuck due to contract

Review.Titre: I have been trying to get the…
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to get the GPS/vehicles coordinated and fixed in the system for 1.5 weeks now to no avail.  I am beyond frustrated, as is the owner of the company.

Review.Titre: We have been having to ask for our…
Review.Contenu: We have been having to ask for our invoice to pay every month for the last couple months. Please send that automatically.Thank you,

Review.Titre: I can't get customer service or billing…
Review.Contenu: I can't get customer service or billing to reply to 5 emails sent regarding invoices

Review.Titre: I can not solve my problem at all I…
Review.Contenu: I can not solve my problem at all I didn’t get what i want it’s zero

Review.Titre: What's the difference between Geoforce…
Review.Contenu: What's the difference between Geoforce Customer Service and a unicorn? Neither exist.  This is by far the worst customer experience I have ever experienced. 10/10 would not recommend. The only person pleasant to deal with was Christine; she actually did what she said she would do and was always polite.Now, what exactly went wrong? The better question is what went right, as that’ll be a much shorter list. When we brought up our concerns and reasons we needed to clean up our account, we were faced with nothing but attitude (and the most "we don't give two sh*ts" attitude). We were told that we were costing the company money, and that if we switch our monthly term they would risk losing us a client. Account clean up took well over a year and a half, due to at least a month long wait in between responses even though we sent a weekly follow up email that was consistently ignored by their team members.  The few occasions that we did hear back, it would take multiple additional weeks for a legitimate response; responses only provided after continuous follow-ups from our admins. The only time there was a prompt response was when they might make a sale. To this day, we are still experiencing billing issues. “Sell it and forget about it” should be their company slogan. Not once have we ever been asked how we are liking the program (Trakopolis and Geotab), unless it was an auto email review response; we have always been the ones to reach out. No one has ever asked if there are things we didn't like, how to improve or just a genuine check in on our company.Between the lack of customer service, rude responses, lack of follow-up and blatant indifference to our plights, I have never been more frustrated dealing with 2 people than I have been with them. Neither of them are proficient at problem solving (or even listening) in any way. Although we do not have an extremely large company, we are still paying a significant amount (thousands monthly) of the devices, software system and support. We should be treated with the same decency as any large company. If they do not have the capacity to do this, all contracts with smaller companies should be void. While I was dealing with cleaning everything up I had my email get blocked for multiple months. Multiple emails back and forth with IT on both sides and the only thing that could be detected was a block.

Review.Titre: Equipment only works half the time and…
Review.Contenu: Equipment only works half the time and calls fir service go unanswered Would never recommend

Review.Titre: Worst in customer service.
Review.Contenu: Worst in customer service.. Salesperson will not return email or phone calls

Review.Titre: Geoforce was not a good ELD for our small company
Review.Contenu: Geoforce was not a good ELD for our small company. We are still waiting to hear back about getting a refund and where to send it. It’s been a month now.

Review.Titre: why does it take too much time to get…
Review.Contenu: why does it take too much time to get magnets sent?  Office is in Plano and I am at DFW.  No comms as to when they are being sent

Review.Titre: There is no technical support.
Review.Contenu: There is no technical support.Half of our ROVR boxes don't work and we cannot get any help.

Review.Titre: Lack of timely  coherent response to my…
Review.Contenu: Lack of timely  coherent response to my inquiry

Review.Titre: We will never do business with your…
Review.Contenu: We will never do business with your company again

Review.Titre: They believe in Sell and forget.
Getting a response from the Geoforce…
Review.Contenu: Getting a response from the Geoforce team is not easy. It took weeks to speak to a human and I still did not get an answer to my question. I'm not fond of their automatic subscription renewal process either.

Review.Titre: i have not received an answer on why…
Review.Contenu: i have not received an answer on why the scores did not match between reports and trying to run through the website to see where violations happen is  awkward and hard to determine. since we are graded on driving the website should be user friendly and is not.

Review.Titre: Sill working at it
Review.Contenu: Good morning

Review.Titre: Geoforce is a bit more difficult to…
Review.Contenu: Geoforce is a bit more difficult to navigate than previous version.Does not give direction of travel when viewing asset.You have to check boxes under Map Layers (overlays) every time you log in to view Wells.

Review.Titre: At one time we had a functioning map…
Review.Contenu: At one time we had a functioning map where we could see all of our assets--NOT ANY MORE!!  Your service staff (Issac) is a dang fine rep for your organization.  Ryan is a fair rep, however COURTNEY is a NOT someone I would have representing my company (he has NO integrity--NONE).

Review.Titre: The customer support needs Improvement
Review.Contenu: The customer support seems to be very slow and not getting the proper response at times.Only get replies during US office hours but our customers need support during middle east office hours.

Review.Titre: Overall the product is good
Review.Contenu: Overall the product is good, the issue is the Geofence portion.  Creating a geofence should be much easier.  When inputting the GPS Coordinates it should pinpoint the spot on the map, instead I was told that the spot is in the middle of the screen and I find that hard to believe because over 90% of my needed geofences are not accurate.

Review.Titre: new user
Review.Contenu: When I add a new user to a share to account, I always have to email and ask for the compliance tab to be added to that user. I takes a full day before I get a reply from Geo.

Review.Titre: Lack of functional reporting, mediocre customer service
Review.Contenu: Since worldview was acquired by Geoforce, our experience has been mediocre.  The primary issue is that we were not provided with an option to move forward into Geoforce with the same reporting options as we had with Worldview.  After 18 months now of using the GT0 devices, they are definitely NOT as useful to us as the reporting provided by the GlobalTAG devices.  We are stuck since we have so much money invested in the devices.  However, the functionality of Geoforce compared to Worldview is different enough that we would look for another provider if it were not so expensive to do so.The customer service provided by Geoforce is also lacking.  The customer service folks do not seem to know any more about the system than I do, and are not interested in doing whatever it takes to solve my problem.

Review.Titre: We are all having issues with it…
Review.Contenu: We are all having issues with it because, the ones that use it majority of the day have to keep it open and it keeps logging us out. We are having to log in too many times.

Review.Titre: The serivce was okay
Review.Contenu: The serivce was okay, it just took several days for them to respond

Review.Titre: New services; Not impressed
Review.Contenu: Devices are still crashing.  Website lost some features like specific speed notifications; setting up reports is not user friendly

Review.Titre: Quick and efficient service for a…
Review.Contenu: Quick and efficient service for a custom request.

Review.Titre: Turnaround time was 7 hours to simply…
Review.Contenu: Turnaround time was 7 hours to simply create a share to account. Seems a little lengthy.

Review.Titre: Overall, really happy
Review.Contenu: Everyone that I've dealt with at Geoforce has been helpful and easy to deal with.  We use several different products/devices in many different ways.  Our business is always evolving, which creates new needs and challenges regularly.  They are always willing to help us try to address new needs.  I don't believe a service company can achieve a perfect rating, so four stars it is.  There are always going to be issues with technology, so there will always be room for improvement.  Might be a hint of growing pains going on with them and us.  Overall, really happy with what they do and provide.

Review.Titre: We needed the plan on Regulatory Plan
Review.Contenu: We needed the plan on Regulatory Plan, so our driver could log in. At first we didn't get a response, but once we sent the email directly to support, you took care of the issue right away and we appreciate it. Our driver was able to go on his way.

Review.Titre: I think that we need from you
Review.Contenu: I think that we need from you, something mor specific to controlate 1000 liters SS IBC. Some device that makes possible to track this equipment without being affected by the barriers of sheds and pilings ... we are eagerly awaiting a technically and economically viable solution... Good Luck!!!

Review.Titre: Have used their slog when they first…
Review.Contenu: Have used their slog when they first started and added tracking also been happy with the service that they have they always did their best to help out. I had to put my tracking on hold and they where a great help when we where having many issues with other systems that we had to have onboard thanks GeForce

Review.Titre: Overall
Review.Contenu: Overall, the service is quite useful. The customer care is great. The only problem that I have with the software, is the delay in following/locating assets.  The delay is often frustrating. It would make the service superior, in my opinion, if this was real-time.  Thanks for taking this survey.

Review.Titre: There is always room for improvement
Review.Contenu: There is always room for improvement.  I spoke with Lucas recently (which, by the way, I was very please to have him give me a call) and he did what he could to help me.  There were a couple of things that I asked for help with to find out they were just not available at this time.  He made note of my 'wants' and hoped that, along with the requests of other users, the functionality of the software would become more user friendly in the future.

Review.Titre: Better Driver
Review.Contenu: I feel that the system is very effective overall.  There are a few things that I feel can be improved upon.  I don't know if it would be possible to improve upon some of the issues I have.  There were many times that I received a speeding report because the unit had my vehicle on the feeder instead of the freeway.  Also upon entering the freeway I received some speeding reports.  The only other issue is that the emails were sometimes inconsistent in being sent.  Other that these few issues I feel that it is better than some of the others I have had in my vehicle.  It did take some getting used to but I feel that it has made me a better and safer driver.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Great quality. Training, customer service, and reporting review
Review.Contenu: We were given training in person my a geoforce professional to use the geotab integrated technology and software. There is advanced admin features for reporting and keeping a closer eye on mileage, fuel, and HOS. My only complaint is I want reporting to be more flexible and customizable, it takes a lot of maneuvering and combining reports to get more specific data. However, the customer service is quick to respond and get the case resolved and the salesman service has always come through.

Review.Titre: Once my email got to the right person I…
Review.Contenu: Once my email got to the right person I had a quick response

Review.Titre: System gives us access to our fleet
Prompt and professional service is…important
Review.Contenu: Prompt and professional service is truly appreciated.  Thank you

Review.Titre: Review
Review.Contenu: Still running through, but looks to be fun using this. Thanks

Review.Titre: Excellent after sales service
We run a contracting business in the…
Review.Contenu: We run a contracting business in the agriculture sector.We were looking for a unique tracker for our machine.Quick google and phone call with Chris & the tracker was on its way and doing everything we wanted.We defiently recommend Chris and geoforce trackers.

Review.Titre: Equipment is Ok but service is excellent
Review.Contenu: To be brutally honest, we have had some issues with the devices themselves.  They can sometimes be a little finicky and quit reporting or be too sensitive in some of the parameters.  However, Caitlin Murray has always been my go-to lady at Geoforce and she's great.  They should change her name to Johnny because she is ALWAYS Johnny On-The-Spot when i have issues.  Geoforce gets at least an extra 1 1/2 to 2 stars just due to her customer service.

Review.Titre: Geoforce
Review.Contenu: We have had Geoforce GPS units for years.  Customer service has always been good.  A couple of the units are sensitive, but overall units have been reliable.  We were even able to locate a stolen truck with the GPS.

Review.Titre: Aaron Johnson is the BEST!!
Review.Contenu: Aaron Johnson is the BEST!!! Our company loves using him. He’s amazing at what he does and we are so grateful for him. Best customer service around.

Review.Titre: We look and looked for a solution for…
Review.Contenu: We look and looked for a solution for our non-powered heavy equipment attachments and could not be happier. We have put these on large wheel loader and excavator buckets, shears, grapples, breakers and more. Our sales rep was great at explaining the pro's and cons and support has been fantastic.

Review.Titre: Outstanding support
Review.Contenu: I sent in an email to support looking for help in how to create a speed report besides using bread crumb and writing all the information.  I was expecting an email directing me on how to do it if it was possible.  I received a phone call and with in minutes I had the exact report I was hoping for.  My support person (sorry I didn't write her name down) went above and beyond to help me and made my life better and easier.  Thank You for your assistance.

Review.Titre: Asset ID Verbiage
Review.Contenu: Sam Lerma gave excellent customer support.  I wanted to use engine model number as the Asset ID but you can’t have the same number listed more than once.  The Asset name can be the same so the fix was just switch information in the two sections.  This will work great because an update is coming out to allow you to change column positioning and will allow for the unit number to be placed first.

Review.Titre: Not receiving reports
Review.Contenu: Geoforce was tasked with finding out why the reports that I get on a daily basis, did not get to me from Saturday morning, 10-8-22 through 10-10-22.  The problem is resolved, and I should get my reports tomorrow morning.  Geoforce always get the problem resolved in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Geoforce went above and beyond
Review.Contenu: I think my dealings with them have gone really well.  David has responded to my requests and the trackers turned up in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Geoforce has been the solution we were…
Review.Contenu: Geoforce has been the solution we were looking for with our non powered fleet attachments. The devices are durable, reliable. Sales and customer service are hands down first class.

Review.Titre: I had trouble viewing assets on the web…
Review.Contenu: I had trouble viewing assets on the web map. Contacted help desk for assistance. I had immediate response and suggested solution. It instantly ruled out account issues and pointed out problem my end.The suggested solution worked and my problem sorted.

Review.Titre: You answered the phone without a mile…
Review.Contenu: You answered the phone without a mile long menu tree or wait-that's a good start. Of course Ms. Brown was pleasant to deal with and very helpful/knowledgeable. And it is nice to know she had backup from the engineering team if it got that serious.

Review.Titre: Compliance Department
Review.Contenu: Great visit with Geoforce team.  It was very informative and we talked about getting different reports that would save me some time and the company money.

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: Customer service has always been quick to respond when we need them. When it was time to renew our contract, we got a good deal and you helped us upgrade our older GeoTabs to stay up-to-date.

Review.Titre: Great customer service with quick…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service with quick turnaround times. I honestly didn't expect to have someone get back to me until the next day due to the time difference.

Review.Titre: Geoforce has provided over 150 GPSs to…
Review.Contenu: Geoforce has provided over 150 GPSs to our company over the past several years.  The tracking system is easy to use, and more than anything else their customer service is outstanding!

Review.Titre: Geoforce is very dependable
Review.Contenu: Geoforce is very dependable!  They've always worked with me, and if installation dates need to be modified, they contact me.  Kudos to Mike Svoboda & Isaac Henley!!!

Review.Titre: Excellent Solution for the toughest Telematics challenges
Review.Contenu: Geoforce excels when it comes to clear communication, technical knowhow of their products and giving timely and accurate feedback.Products are excellent for the market needs and the team behind it allow for the deployment to happen fast, smooth and achieve needed goals

Review.Titre: Timely and professional
Review.Contenu: Timely and professional.  Best part, with the bulk update support, it saves me a lot of time.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Sam was extremely helpful in helping me…
Review.Contenu: Sam was extremely helpful in helping me to correct problems with our GPS units.  She was patient and helped me in a way I could understand and easily fix the issues.

Review.Titre: I am so very thankful for the help and…
Review.Contenu: I am so very thankful for the help and training and excellent customer service. I would have been lost in my position without the patience and explanation from your team.  Kudos to your team.

Review.Titre: quick responses when requested.
Review.Contenu: Answered my question without going through several people or areas.

Review.Titre: Tech support
Review.Contenu: Alway quick and accurate responses, makes it a pleasure to deal with the company as a whole. The support staff has always been simply amazing.

Review.Titre: Adding new user to our account
Review.Contenu: I contacted Geoforce after lunch today, 8/15/2022. I left my office at 3:30 PM any they had already taken care of my request. Timely fashion as always. Good people doing a good job.

Review.Titre: Support is very helpful
Review.Contenu: Support is very helpful, had a unit that was not reporting couldn't get my regular tec. to look at it so they helped me go through the step on how to reset and what to look for.  It's great to have help when you need it and not be left hanging.

Review.Titre: The actions that I requested were taken…
Review.Contenu: The actions that I requested were taken care of in a timely manner.  The work was done, I was notified, and progressing with the reports as required.  Very good work and in a timely fashion.

Review.Titre: I have always had the best results with…
Review.Contenu: I have always had the best results with the help desk. Very patient with all my questions and issues. Thank you all for doing an outstanding job. I appreciate it very much.

Review.Titre: Helpful and informative
Review.Contenu: Christine Brown has been very responsive and informative. She has a quick answer for everything and makes sure everything is complete.

Review.Titre: Incorrect Driver Behavior Report Information
Review.Contenu: Inaccurate Driver Behavior speeding report tracking is a continuing issue—excessive quantities of minor and moderate speeding events for September.Support followed up with, "... devices appear to be recording speed and safety events as expected, and the system is calculating those events correctly on reports," giving examples of actual events. Upon further investigation, we found those events to be correct.Previous issues with the software had been corrected, and those issues were no longer issues. Thank you for your assistance in resolving this problem.

Review.Titre: We have been using Geoforce for years…5 years with no issues
Review.Contenu: We have been using Geoforce for years now on all of our trucks and equipment, all aspects are outstanding from ease of install, accuracy and customer support. More importantly the reliability is second to none!

Review.Titre: I have always gotten timely support and…
Review.Contenu: I have always gotten timely support and resolution on every case that has been opened.  It's great to have service when you need it.

Review.Titre: Christine Brown Quick Response to customer query
Review.Contenu: Christine made herself available quickly to run through how to fix the maintenance / service alert

Review.Titre: quality service
Review.Contenu: Excellent teleconference. I learned a lot from the guys. I will reach out to them again.

Review.Titre: Hieu is the most helpful resource
Review.Contenu: Hieu is the most helpful resource! He is always fast and so intelligent. He is friendly and kind with such a happy demeanor.

Review.Titre: I requested a report be created that…
Review.Contenu: I requested a report be created that didn't exist. Without any wait at all, Lucas responded and had completed what was requested! Awesome!

Review.Titre: I called in with a question regarding…
Review.Contenu: I called in with a question regarding adding a new tracker and it was taken care of swiftly and in a very professional manner, great team

Review.Contenu: Tioluwani took the time to call me and go through setting up some new alters. I appreciate the great customer service!

Review.Titre: Impressive Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I called seeking platform training, and the representative was able to arrange/schedule training for me within a matter of minutes. N ow that is great customer service!!

Review.Titre: I love this system!!!
Review.Contenu: I love this system! The interface is simple yet sophisticated and the entry process is too smooth!!!

Review.Titre: Quality Products
Review.Contenu: Quality Products, Useful website, and sales rep that responds quickly to questions and product needs.

Review.Titre: Christine also goes above and beyond to…
Review.Contenu: Christine also goes above and beyond to support our team and is always quick to respond!

Review.Titre: Very quick responding to request for…
Review.Contenu: Very quick responding to request for information and thorough follow-up during the order process. I wanted a solution that provided for low maintenance battery solution and small secued profile.

Review.Titre: All my concerns and installs were taken…
Review.Contenu: All my concerns and installs were taken care of in an swift and professional manner. Thank you to the team

Review.Titre: having intermittent reporting on one…
Review.Contenu: having intermittent reporting on one our units and with minutes of sending an email to support my problem was fixed.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer support over the phone
Review.Contenu: Christina was excellent in terms of helping me with providing access to the Geoforce program and specialized reports for a coworker of mine.

Review.Titre: Help recreating files
Review.Contenu: We had files deleted by one of our employees, and Gordo Taylor helped me fix them. As always a job well done.

Review.Titre: Sorted my problem
Review.Contenu: Emailed a question about changing odometer readings, was called on my cell and walked-through.

Review.Titre: the customer service rep that helped me…
Review.Contenu: the customer service rep that helped me last week was very good, he walked me thru the process of pulling a report and i needed and was very patient, i appreciate that, alot of people lack patience in explaining stuff, but he was very good

Review.Titre: Geofence set up
Review.Contenu: This problem was addressed and taken care of immediately as always the way Geoforce does it.

Review.Titre: Excellent Service
Review.Contenu: Amazing customer service and support. the whole team from sales, to installation services are amazing to deal with.

Review.Titre: Always Ready To Help
Review.Contenu: As usual, the support team at GeoForce was quick and concise in answering my question. In addition, they are always very responsive and professional.

Review.Titre: The lady listened properly and…
Review.Contenu: The lady listened properly and understood what i was trying to say

Review.Titre: GREAT RESPONSE TIME WHEN GETTING UNIS…
Review.Contenu: GREAT RESPONSE TIME WHEN GETTING UNIS SET UP. GIRLS DOING SET UP WERE VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE.

Review.Titre: good products and useful for chemical…
Review.Contenu: good products and useful for chemical industria, but unfortunately for brazilian realitty the real cost are high, despite of this point  we have beeen worked in some customrs that need information in real time.

Review.Titre: Geoforce not only produces great…
Review.Contenu: Geoforce not only produces great devices but is always willing to support its customers and improve when challenged.

Review.Titre: Asked for password change instructions
Review.Contenu: Asked for password change instructions, got them within a couple of minutes - excellent

Review.Titre: So far this is a great application
Review.Contenu: So far this is a great application. The helpdesk and tutorials are helpful and I will recommend it to others.

Review.Titre: Geoforce is very efficient in…
Review.Contenu: Geoforce is very efficient in processing and shipping our orders.  I give them an excellent review.

Review.Titre: Excellent service
Review.Contenu: Excellent service. They are always quirk to respond when ever I have an issue.

Review.Titre: Outstanding company to work with
Review.Contenu: Outstanding company to work with.Very professional supportive couldn’t ask more out of a company.

Review.Titre: Company rep was helpful

Review.Contenu: Isaac is thorough and follows up with the information needed in reference to the device installed.

Review.Contenu: I gave Geoforce a series of events I needed, and they were taken care of with no problem, and in a short period of time. Job well done.

Review.Titre: Our invoice Corrected
Review.Contenu: Our invoice was incorrect, and it was corrected in a very timely manner.

Review.Titre: Very easy transaction.
Review.Contenu: Very easy transaction.Fast shipping. Always help when I have issues.

Review.Contenu: Isaac was very helpful in explaining the programming and guiding me through the process

Review.Contenu: I have worked with Sam a couple of times and always get every question answered and don't feel rushed.

Review.Contenu: Quick response, so polite and helpful. I appreciate it, thank you!

Review.Contenu: Speedy responses and correct actions.  Thank you
